title: Account Take over of millions of  MTN users account due to lack of Rate limiting when sending OTP code
content:
I attached a PDF document to this report which explained the vulnerability in full details and I also attached a link to the POC video in the document.
Impact
Account take over of about any MTN user account.
vuln_description: The vulnerability allows an attacker to perform an account takeover of MTN user accounts due to the lack of rate limiting on OTP (One-Time Password) code requests. This enables brute-force attacks where an attacker can send unlimited OTP requests to guess the correct code and gain access to the account.
reason: The vulnerability is straightforward to exploit as it only requires sending multiple OTP requests without any restrictions. The lack of rate limiting is a common security flaw and does not involve complex interactions or novel logic.
